mapper.sql: id, name, link_phone, create_date, update_date, remarks, is_valid
mapper.insert: insert into customers (id, name, link_phone, create_date, update_date, remarks, is_valid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into customers
id,
name,
link_phone,
create_date,
update_date,
remarks,
is_valid,

mapper.update:
update customers
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_phone = #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update customers set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_phone = #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,name from customers where is_valid=1
